name: shiny-stone
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Evolves a minccino into cinccino, a roselia into roserade, or a togetic into togekiss.
short_effect: Evolves a Minccino into Cinccino, a Roselia into Roserade, or a Togetic into Togekiss.

flavor_text.x_y: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.
